title: "Artificial intelligence and data mining are being used to measure aerodynamic flows"
excerpt: "Developing new ways to measure turbulent flows that are more efficient and reliable is the main objective of the NEXTFLOW research project at the Universidad Carlos III de Madrid (UC3M), funded by an ERC Starting Grant from the European Union."
